Question
========
What is no assumption in multiple linear regression?

Answerlist
----------
* Independent observations
* Heteroscedasticity
* Normally distributed errors
* Linear relationships between the Xs and Y


Solution
========
Homoscedasticity is an assumption in multiple linear regression. Hetereoscedasticity should instead be avoided.
